title: Gamification System - Badges, Achievements & Streaks
description: Implement a comprehensive gamification system to increase member engagement. Includes achievement badges, progress tracking, milestone celebrations, and streak tracking. This is a HIGH PRIORITY competitive feature that Smile.io and Rivo have but TradeUp lacks.

userStories.title: Create badge database models
userStories.description: Create database tables for badges and member badge assignments to track achievements.
acceptanceCriteria: Badge model with: id, name, description, icon_url, criteria_type, criteria_value, points_reward, is_active, created_at
MemberBadge model with: id, member_id, badge_id, earned_at, notified_at
Indexes on member_id and badge_id for efficient queries

userStories.title: Create badge CRUD API endpoints
userStories.description: API endpoints for merchants to create, manage, and view badges.
acceptanceCriteria: GET /api/badges - list all badges for tenant
DELETE /api/badges/{id} - delete badge (soft delete if members have it)

userStories.title: Implement badge criteria evaluation service
userStories.description: Service to check if a member qualifies for badges based on their activity.
acceptanceCriteria: Support criteria types: first_purchase, purchase_count, total_spent, trade_in_count, referral_count, tier_reached, streak_days
Badges awarded only once per member

userStories.title: Create default badge templates
userStories.description: Pre-configured badges that merchants can enable out of the box.
acceptanceCriteria: Hot Streak badge (3 consecutive months active)
Seed data script to create default badges

userStories.title: Add streak tracking to members
userStories.description: Track consecutive activity periods for members to enable streak-based achievements.
acceptanceCriteria: Add current_streak and longest_streak columns to members table
Streak increments on monthly activity (purchase or trade-in)
Streak resets after 30 days of inactivity

userStories.title: Create badge management UI in admin
userStories.description: React components for merchants to manage badges in the admin dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Badge create/edit modal with criteria configuration
Badge preview showing icon and description

userStories.title: Add badge showcase to customer account extension
userStories.description: Display earned badges in the customer-facing rewards dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows earned badges with earned date
Shows locked badges with progress toward earning
Badges displayed with icons and descriptions

userStories.title: Create achievement unlocked celebration modal
userStories.description: Celebratory modal shown when customer earns a new badge.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows badge icon, name, and points earned
Modal triggered when viewing page after earning badge

userStories.title: Add progress bars for tier advancement
userStories.description: Visual progress indicators showing how close member is to next tier.
acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar component shows points/spend toward next tier

userStories.title: Implement milestone celebrations
userStories.description: Special celebrations for significant point milestones (100, 500, 1000, etc.).
